title: Sticky chicken sausages with greens & mash

ingredients.item: 2 x 400g packs carrot, swede and potato mash

instructions.step: Heat ½ tbsp oil in a large frying pan over a medium heat and add the onions, sage and sausages. Fry for 10 minutes, stirring regularly, until golden. Stir in the cider and mustard, and simmer for another 10 minutes until the sauce is reduced and the sausages are cooked through.
Meanwhile, heat the remaining ½ tbsp oil in another large frying pan and add the greens and 1 tbsp water. Cook, stirring for 3-4 minutes until wilted, then add the lemon juice.
Heat the mash according to the pack instructions, then serve with the greens, sausages and onion gravy.
